posts.message:
I think most of you are following what Microsoft is doing nowadays. Just a small advise for the aspnet developers, you may start reading about the new changes that is happening to the aspnet, the tools that become part of the game for us (npm, bower, grant... ). 
If you are full stack developer (you are writing all the layers including front end) if you don't already, you may read about client frameworks like angularjs and react...

posts.message:
Hello everyone, 

We are doing a survey to help us create an application that can help people schedule and organize getting together activities with their friends. 

The survey only takes 2-3 minutes and its super easy to answer. Please share if you like the idea and want this application to happen.

posts.message:
The How Old website, release by Microsoft (http://how-old.net) offers a seemingly simple service: upload a picture of a person and it will guess their age.

Linked in the same page, an interesting blog post about how they achived this (http://blogs.technet.com/b/machinelearning/archive/2015/04/29/fun-with-ml-stream-analytics-and-powerbi-observing-virality-in-real-time.aspx).

TLDR; the whole thing is based on Microsoft face detection and comparison API (http://www.projectoxford.ai/demo/face)
posts.caption: how-old.net
